<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">But gradually the audience is mastered by the

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Finally it rises upon the Tempest. But the play has outgrown</l>

              <corr>theatre</corr>
            </choice> of the brain. The playwright is replaced by the man</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Anon is dead.</l>
